sections.title: Before Pipeline Rule - Business Event - astroshop.placeorder.success

input.value:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| fields timestamp, event.provider, event.type, userId, orderId, revenue, country,trace_id,ResBody
| sort timestamp desc

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" AND event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| fields timestamp, event.provider, event.type, userId, orderId, revenue, country, trace_id, ResBody
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 0

| limit 0

sections.title: Logs that will be used to for the Fraud Check Step

input.value:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.container.name == "frauddetectionservice"
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "Consumed record with orderId:")
| parse content, """DATA 'Consumed record with orderId: ' ld:orderId ','"""
| fields timestamp, orderId, content
| sort timestamp desc

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.container.name == "frauddetectionservice"
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "Consumed record with orderId:")
| parse content, """DATA 'Consumed record with orderId: ' ld:orderId ','"""
| fields timestamp, orderId, content
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 0
grail.query:

| filter k8s.container.name == "frauddetectionservice"

| parse content, """DATA 'Consumed record with orderId: ' ld:orderId ','"""
| fields timestamp, orderId, content
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 0

sections.title: Parse orderId from log lines to be used in business event for Fraud Check

input.value:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.container.name == "frauddetectionservice"
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "Consumed record with orderId:")
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "orderId")
| parse content, """DATA 'Consumed record with orderId: ' ld:orderId ','"""
| fields timestamp, orderId
| sort timestamp desc

grail.canonicalQuery:

| filter k8s.container.name == "frauddetectionservice"
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "Consumed record with orderId:")
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "orderId")

| fields timestamp, orderId
| sort timestamp desc

sections.markdown: ## Business Events - Logs Converted to Business Events - Fraud Check

input.value:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success"
| fields timestamp, event.provider, event.type, orderId, trace_id
| sort timestamp desc

grail.canonicalQuery:

| filter event.provider == "astroshop" AND event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success"

| limit 0

sections.markdown: ## Business Events - Metric - Place Order Success By Country
## Business Events - Alert - Place Order - Zero Dollar Orders

input.value:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" and revenue == 0
| filter revenue == 0
| fields timestamp, event.provider, event.type, userId, orderId, revenue, country, shippingTrackingId, trace_id
| sort timestamp desc

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" AND event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" AND revenue == 0
| filter revenue == 0
| fields timestamp, event.provider, event.type, userId, orderId, revenue, country, shippingTrackingId, trace_id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 0
